answers.answer: Excessive thirst is a sign of diabetes. Your "constantly use the bathroom" may well be normal. Since you didn't provide any information on how often you drink, or how much you drink, or how often you empty your bladder we cannot make a determination one way or the other - normal; abnormal.Excessive urination may also be the case for Diabetes Insipidus, and I say may. Go here if you wish to read an explanation of DI  http://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/ency/article/000377.htmIn order to distinguish DI from other causes of excess urination, blood glucose levels, bicarbonate levels, and calcium levels need to be tested.
